footer.description: Your comprehensive guide to discovering the rich cultural heritage and vibrant community of San Luis Potosí. We help expatriates navigate the city's cultural landscape with curated recommendations and local insights.
footer.wazaSlogan: We are WAZA. And we're coding a cooler world.

forms.weWillContact: We've received your request and will contact you shortly.
forms.recaptchaError: Please complete the reCAPTCHA or try again later.

wellness.pageTitle: Health & Wellness Services | San Luis Way
wellness.metaDescription: Holistic wellness services for expats in San Luis Potosí, including mental health, fitness, and nutritional support.
wellness.heroDescription: Your guide to health and wellness in San Luis Potosí. Access quality healthcare, fitness centers, and mental health support.
wellness.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your wellness goals...
wellness.fitnessDesc: Find gyms, personal trainers, and sports clubs
wellness.coachingDesc: Personalized coaching to achieve your health goals

petCare.pageTitle: Pet Care Services | San Luis Way
petCare.metaDescription: Complete pet care services for expats in San Luis Potosí, including veterinary, grooming, sitting, and relocation support.
petCare.heroDescription: Comprehensive and compassionate care for your beloved pets. From grooming to veterinary services, we're here for you.
petCare.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your pet and the services you need...
petCare.veterinaryDesc: Access to trusted vets and emergency care
petCare.sittingDesc: Reliable care for your pets when you are away
petCare.groomingDesc: Professional grooming services to keep your pet looking great
petCare.trainingDesc: Expert training for a well-behaved companion
petCare.relocationDesc: Assistance with national and international pet transport
petCare.insuranceDesc: Find the best insurance options for your pet

homeServices.pageTitle: Home Services | San Luis Way - Reliable Home Support
homeServices.metaDescription: Comprehensive home services in San Luis Potosí, including repairs, cleaning, utility setup, and contractor sourcing.
homeServices.heroDescription: Reliable and professional home services to make your life easier. From maintenance to cleaning, we've got you covered.
homeServices.messagePlaceholder: Please describe the services you need...
homeServices.repairsDesc: Plumbing, electrical, carpentry, and appliance repairs.
homeServices.cleaningDesc: Scheduled deep cleaning, move-in/out cleaning, and regular housekeeping.
homeServices.utilitiesDesc: Assistance with electricity, water, gas, and bill payments.
homeServices.internetDesc: Installation of internet, television, and phone lines.
homeServices.paintingDesc: Interior/exterior painting, wallpapering, and design consultation.
homeServices.contractorsDesc: Finding trusted professionals for remodeling and installations.
homeServices.securityDesc: Alarm system installation, camera setup, and security assessments.
homeServices.pestDesc: Safe and effective solutions for all common household pests.
homeServices.movingDesc: Local moving assistance and secure storage solutions.

familySupport.pageTitle: Family Support Services | San Luis Way
familySupport.metaDescription: Comprehensive support for expat families in San Luis Potosí, including childcare, education, and community integration.
familySupport.heroDescription: Find the resources your family needs to thrive in San Luis Potosí. From childcare to education, we're here to help.
familySupport.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your family's needs...
familySupport.educationDesc: Access to tutors and educational resources
familySupport.workshopsDesc: Join workshops on parenting in a new culture
familySupport.supportGroupsDesc: Connect with other expat families for support
familySupport.healthcareDesc: Guidance on finding pediatricians and family doctors

hero.description: Discover a sophisticated lifestyle where colonial charm meets modern comfort. Your curated guide to living, exploring, and thriving in Mexico's hidden gem.

benefits.title: A Life Well Lived
benefits.description: Experience the perfect blend of affordability, culture, and quality of life in Mexico's second-best city

affordable.title: Affordable Excellence
affordable.description: Enjoy a sophisticated lifestyle at a fraction of the cost. Quality housing, dining, and services that don't break the bank.

culture.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
culture.description: Immerse yourself in centuries of history, colonial architecture, and vibrant traditions that make every day special.

recognition.title: Mexico's 2nd Best City to Live
recognition.description: Recognized by IMCO for quality of life, safety, and opportunity

circleOfTrust.title: The Circle of Trust
circleOfTrust.description1: Everything we recommend on San Luis Way is
circleOfTrust.description2: We're not a generic directory - we're a curated community of places we know and trust.
circleOfTrust.description3: Every place on our platform has been
circleOfTrust.description4: by local residents. We don't accept just any business - only those that meet our standards of quality, service, and authenticity.

curatedByLocals.title: Curated by Locals
curatedByLocals.description: Every recommendation comes from someone who lives in SLP and knows the city

safetyGuaranteed.title: Safety Guaranteed
safetyGuaranteed.description: Only places in safe zones with good community reputation

qualityOverQuantity.title: Quality Over Quantity
qualityOverQuantity.description: We prefer fewer high-quality places than an endless unfiltered directory
